page.title: 12Clubs - Silloth
page.content: There are various clubs in Silloth, some only social but some connected with sport. The {Social Club }is a social meeting place in Waver St. with a bar, dance floor, etc., and can be hired for parties. The {R.A.F.A. Club ( Royal Air Force Assn.) has various bars, and puts on light entertainment. Very few of the members are now ex-RAF as the War was so long ago. The{Round {Table Club }is for young ( under-40 ) business and professional men, whilst the{Rotary Club}is the same thing but without an upper age limit.The{Ladies' {Circle }and the {Inner Wheel }are the respective clubs for their wives. The {Old Age Pensioners' Club }has their clubhouse in the playing field. There are a few other clubs like the{Womens' {Institute,}etc.
